Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Interface ResourceManagerObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualClient
public interface ResourceManagerObserver
A class can implement the ResourceManagerObserver interface when it wants to be informed of changes in observable objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void anyProductionProfitRequest​(int numOfAny)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when there's ANY resource to convert from profit.
    void anyRequirementConversionRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> optionOfConversion, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> optionOfDiscount, int numOfAny)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when there's a ANY resource to convert from cost.
    void bufferUpdate​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when the resource buffer is changed.
    void depotPositioningRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when it gets resource from market.
    void depotUpdate​(Resource depotUpdated, int index, boolean isNormalDepot)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when a depot is changed.
    void productionCardSelectionCompleted()
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when a card has been chosen correctly for production.
    void strongboxUpdate​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> strongboxUpdated)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when the strongbox is changed.
    void updateLeaderDepot​(java.util.ArrayList<Depot> depots, boolean isDiscard)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when a leader depot is changed.
    void warehouseRemovingRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
    Get an update from the ResourceManager when some resources need to be removed from the warehouse.

  • Method Details

    • bufferUpdate

      void bufferUpdate​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when the resource buffer is changed.
      Parameters:
      resources - the resource buffer.

    • depotPositioningRequest

      void depotPositioningRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when it gets resource from market.
      Parameters:
      resources - the resources from market.

    • warehouseRemovingRequest

      void warehouseRemovingRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when some resources need to be removed from the warehouse.
      Parameters:
      resources - the resources to remove.

    • anyRequirementConversionRequest

      void anyRequirementConversionRequest​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> optionOfConversion, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> optionOfDiscount, int numOfAny)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when there's a ANY resource to convert from cost.
      Parameters:
      optionOfConversion - the option that the player has to convert.
      optionOfDiscount - the discount available to the player.
      numOfAny - the number of ANY to convert.

    • anyProductionProfitRequest

      void anyProductionProfitRequest​(int numOfAny)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when there's ANY resource to convert from profit.
      Parameters:
      numOfAny - the number of ANY to convert.

    • strongboxUpdate

      void strongboxUpdate​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> strongboxUpdated)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when the strongbox is changed.
      Parameters:
      strongboxUpdated - the updated strongbox.

    • depotUpdate

      void depotUpdate​(Resource depotUpdated, int index, boolean isNormalDepot)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when a depot is changed.
      Parameters:
      depotUpdated - the updated depot.
      index - the index of the depot.
      isNormalDepot - true if it's not a leader depot.

    • updateLeaderDepot

      void updateLeaderDepot​(java.util.ArrayList<Depot> depots, boolean isDiscard)
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when a leader depot is changed.
      Parameters:
      depots - the depots of the leader.
      isDiscard - true if the depot is discarded.

    • productionCardSelectionCompleted

      void productionCardSelectionCompleted()
      Get an update from the ResourceManager when a card has been chosen correctly for production.
